Home.summary: I'm a backend developer specialized in the Python language, especially the Flask and FastApi frameworks. I've been developing software professionally for 3 years, from creating the backend, creating and structuring databases (from collecting data to creating queries) and creating and applying business rules and best practices. I am currently developing my skills in Java and Go.

CobapCargoProject.name: Cobap - Delivery management
CobapCargoProject.description: I actively participated in the creation and execution of the Backend, ETLs and database management and modeling. System responsible for managing deliveries for the company.

JSMarketplaceProject.name: Marketplace B2B
JSMarketplaceProject.description: Main backend programmer for the marketplace management system and the marketplace itself. I also managed the database and data ETLs between the application and the company's data warehouse.

PinheiroSeparationProject.name: Pinheiro - Product sorting management
PinheiroSeparationProject.description: I actively participated in the creation and execution of the Backend, ETLs and database management and modeling. System responsible for managing product separations and restocking for the pinheiro group's partner companies.
